name: MDLSubmesh
desc: A container for index buffer data and material information to be used in rendering all or part of a 3D object.

items.name: init(indexBuffer: MDLMeshBuffer, indexCount: Int, indexType: MDLIndexBitDepth, geometryType: MDLGeometryType, material: MDLMaterial?)
items.desc: Initializes a submesh with an index buffer and the specified properties.

items.name: init(name: String, indexBuffer: MDLMeshBuffer, indexCount: Int, indexType: MDLIndexBitDepth, geometryType: MDLGeometryType, material: MDLMaterial?)
items.desc: Initializes a named submesh with an index buffer and the specified properties.

items.name: init(name: String, indexBuffer: MDLMeshBuffer, indexCount: Int, indexType: MDLIndexBitDepth, geometryType: MDLGeometryType, material: MDLMaterial?, topology: MDLSubmeshTopology?)
items.desc: Initializes a named submesh with a specific topology.

items.name: init?(mdlSubmesh: MDLSubmesh, indexType: MDLIndexBitDepth, geometryType: MDLGeometryType)
items.desc: Initializes a submesh by copying or converting another submesh.

items.name: var indexBuffer: MDLMeshBuffer
items.desc: An object that provides index data for the submesh.

items.name: var indexCount: Int
items.desc: The number of indices in the submesh’s index buffer.

items.name: var indexType: MDLIndexBitDepth
items.desc: The data type for each element in the submesh’s index buffer.

items.name: var geometryType: MDLGeometryType
items.desc: The type of geometric primitives described by the submesh’s index buffer.

items.name: var topology: MDLSubmeshTopology?
items.desc: A description of how the non-uniform layout of the submesh’s index buffer defines the shape of the mesh.

items.name: var material: MDLMaterial?
items.desc: An object that describes the intended surface appearance of the submesh for rendering.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A descriptive name for the submesh.

items.name: enum MDLIndexBitDepth
items.desc: Options for the size of integer data in a submesh’s index buffer, used by the indexType property.

items.name: enum MDLGeometryType
items.desc: Types of geometric primitives for rendering a submesh, used by the geometryType property.
